amendment.description: To make technical corrections to certain provisions relating to overflights of National Parks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1779 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1779 proposed by Senator Coats for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S1535) To make technical corrections to certain provisions relating to overflights of National Parks.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1779 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1779 proposed by Senator Coats for Senator Alexander.
